review: Everyone responds to drugs differently and I know that I am a rare case, but wanted to share in case I can help anyone. I started noticing heart palpitations when I took hydroxyzine, but I thought that the cause was my anxiety. I then took an antidepressant for anxiety and it made me feel like I was having a heart attack. I had severe heart pain/ squeezing/ radiating into my neck and arm. I ended up passing out and having to call 911. Even after being to the ER and 10 other doctors, I was told that my heart was fine and I just have anxiety. Turns out it was the hydroxyzine causing this the whole time as I found out on my own by googling it. If you see this post and you are having heart side effects from hydroxyzine, you are not crazy! Stop the medicine and your heart will return to normal!
